type.type: primary / success / info / warning / error / text / icon

hairline.description: Whether the border is thin or not

hover-stop-propagation.description: Specifies whether to prevent the native node of the node from being clicked
hover-stop-propagation.description_zh: 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态

lang.description: Specify the language in which the user information is returned, zh_CN Chinese Simplified, zh_TW Chinese Traditional, en English
lang.description_zh: 指定返回用户信息的语言，zh_CN 简体中文，zh_TW 繁体中文，en 英文

session-message-title.description: 会话内消息卡片标题，open-type="contact"时有效
session-message-title.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片标题，open-type="contact"时有效

session-message-path.description: 会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，open-type="contact"时有效
session-message-path.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，open-type="contact"时有效

send-message-img.description: 会话内消息卡片图片，open-type="contact"时有效
send-message-img.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片图片，open-type="contact"时有效

app-parameter.description: When the APP is opened, the parameters passed to the APP, open-type=launchApp, are valid
app-parameter.description_zh: 打开 APP 时，向 APP 传递的参数，open-type=launchApp时有效

show-message-card.description: Whether to display the in-session message card, set this parameter to true, the user will enter the customer service session will display a prompt of "Mini Program may be sent" in the lower right corner, and the user can quickly send the Mini Program message after clicking, which is valid when open-type="contact".
show-message-card.description_zh: 是否显示会话内消息卡片，设置此参数为 true，用户进入客服会话会在右下角显示"可能要发送的小程序"提示，用户点击后可以快速发送小程序消息，open-type="contact"时有效

classPrefix.description: Class name prefix for using custom icons, see icon
classPrefix.description_zh: 类名前缀，用于使用自定义图标，参见icon

button-id.description: The unique identifier of the button, which can be used to set the ID of the privacy consent button
button-id.description_zh: 按钮的唯一标识，可用于设置隐私同意授权按钮的id

events.name: getphonenumber
events.description: 获取用户手机号回调,open-type=getPhoneNumber时有效
events.description_zh: 获取用户手机号回调，open-type=getPhoneNumber时有效

events.name: error
events.description: When using open capability, an error callback occurs, which is valid when open-type=launchApp is used
events.description_zh: 当使用开放能力时，发生错误的回调，open-type=launchApp时有效

events.name: launchapp
events.description: 打开 APP 成功的回调，open-type=launchApp时有效
events.description_zh: 打开 APP 成功的回调，open-type=launchApp时有效

events.name: opensetting
events.description: The callback is valid after opening the authorization settings page, open-type=openSetting
events.description_zh: 在打开授权设置页后回调，open-type=openSetting时有效
